page.name: The Chronicle
page.description: The Chronicle is Mason High School's student produced newspaper. Students on The Chronicle must be enrolled in the Journalism courses at MHS. Students on the staff are required to go through an application process. The Chronicle is always looking for photographers, writers, reporters, designers, and webmasters. Students who want to be on The Chronicle staff are encouraged to speak to the advisor/instructor or any member of the staff to learn more about the application and acceptance process.
